Sentencas: In this study, a three dimensional model is constructed to investigate the flow distributions and the pressure variations for a 40-cell solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack.
Titulo: Numerical simulation of flow distribution for external manifold design in solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Computational fluid dynamics (CFD) is used to optimize the design parameters of external manifold in the stack.
Titulo: Numerical simulation of flow distribution for external manifold design in solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The model consists of equations for the network with chamber structure of manifold.
Titulo: Numerical simulation of flow distribution for external manifold design in solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Simulation results indicate that the flow uniformity strongly depends on geometric shapes of manifold, including the joined position between tube and manifold, the dimension of manifold and the number of tubes.
Titulo: Numerical simulation of flow distribution for external manifold design in solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The ratio of flow velocity which describes the uniformity of flow distribution can be decreased by optimizing the geometrical structure of manifolds.
Titulo: Numerical simulation of flow distribution for external manifold design in solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: In addition, it is found that the flow distribution can be intensively influenced by the gas resistance of the stack, which is closely related to the configuration of interconnect channels.
Titulo: Numerical simulation of flow distribution for external manifold design in solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The results summarize the importance of structure design of external manifold for stack performance.
Titulo: Numerical simulation of flow distribution for external manifold design in solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The numerical results are in good agreement with the experimental measurement in a 40-cell stack.
Titulo: Numerical simulation of flow distribution for external manifold design in solid oxide fuel cell stack

Titulo: Numerical simulation of flow distribution for external manifold design in solid oxide fuel cell stack
